verses.verse: וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become מִיָּמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim But it came to pass within a while after בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the time קְצִיר־ <S%H7105><s%> ke-tzir- harvest חִטִּ֗ים <S%H2406><s%> chit-Tim, of wheat וַיִּפְקֹ֨ד <S%H6485><s%> vai-yif-Kod visited שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon that Samson אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> ish-To his wife בִּגְדִ֣י <S%H1423><s%> big-Di A young עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim, goat וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said אָבֹ֥אָה <S%H935><s%> 'a-Vo-'ah I will go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Ti to my wife הֶחָ֑דְרָה <S%H2315><s%> he-Cha-de-rah; into the chamber וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not נְתָנ֥וֹ <S%H5414><s%> ne-ta-No would not suffer אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha But her father לָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo. him to go in

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אָבִ֗יהָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha, And her father אָמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mor I verily אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti thought כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that שָׂנֹ֣א <S%H8130><s%> sa-No that thou hadst utterly שְׂנֵאתָ֔הּ <S%H8130><s%> se-ne-Tah, hated וָאֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-te-Nen-nah her therefore I gave לְמֵרֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H4828><s%> le-me-re-'E-cha; her to thy companion הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אֲחֹתָ֤הּ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah sister הַקְּטַנָּה֙ <S%H6996><s%> hak-ke-tan-Nah [is] not her younger טוֹבָ֣ה <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah fairer מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah, than תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> te-hi- become נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na Please לְךָ֖ le-Cha תַּחְתֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-ha. instead

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson נִקֵּ֥יתִי <S%H5352><s%> nik-Kei-ti shall I be more blameless הַפַּ֖עַם <S%H6471><s%> hap-Pa-'am concerning them Now מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> mip-pe-lish-Tim; than the Philistines כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh though I do אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I עִמָּ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam them רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah. them a displeasure

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson וַיִּלְכֹּ֖ד <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-Kod and caught שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> she-losh- three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שׁוּעָלִ֑ים <S%H7776><s%> shu-'a-Lim; foxes וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took לַפִּדִ֗ים <S%H3940><s%> lap-pi-Dim, firebrands וַיֶּ֤פֶן <S%H6437><s%> vai-Ye-fen and turned זָנָב֙ <S%H2180><s%> za-Nav tail אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זָנָ֔ב <S%H2180><s%> za-Nav, to tail וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and put לַפִּ֥יד <S%H3940><s%> lap-Pid firebrand אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad a בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei between two הַזְּנָב֖וֹת <S%H2180><s%> haz-ze-na-Vot tails בַּתָּֽוֶךְ׃ <S%H8432><s%> bat-Ta-vech. in the midst

וַיַּבְעֶר־ <S%H1197><s%> vai-yav-'er- And when he had set אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh on fire בַּלַּפִּידִ֔ים <S%H3940><s%> bal-lap-pi-Dim, the brands וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-Lach he let [them] go בְּקָמ֣וֹת <S%H7054><s%> be-ka-Mot into the standing corn פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וַיַּבְעֵ֛ר <S%H1197><s%> vai-yav-'Er and burnt up מִגָּדִ֥ישׁ <S%H1430><s%> mig-ga-Dish both the shocks וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- along קָמָ֖ה <S%H7054><s%> ka-Mah and also the standing corn וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- along כֶּ֥רֶם <S%H3754><s%> Ke-rem with the vineyards זָֽיִת׃ <S%H2132><s%> Za-yit. [and] olives

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said פְלִשְׁתִּים֮ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim Then the Philistines מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah Who hath done זֹאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> zoT likewise וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, this;And they answered שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> shim-shOn Samson חֲתַ֣ן <S%H2860><s%> cha-Tan the son in law הַתִּמְנִ֔י <S%H8554><s%> hat-tim-Ni, of the Timnite כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach because he had taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To, his wife וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nah and given לְמֵרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H4828><s%> le-me-re-'E-hu; her to his companion וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu came up פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> vai-yis-re-Fu and burnt אוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha her and her father בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh. with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- unto them Though תַּעֲשׂ֖וּן <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Sun ye have done כָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> ka-Zot; this כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Since נִקַּ֥מְתִּי <S%H5358><s%> nik-Kam-ti yet will I be avenged בָכֶ֖ם va-Chem וְאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char of you and after אֶחְדָּֽל׃ <S%H2308><s%> 'ech-Dal. that I will cease

וַיַּ֨ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach And he smote אוֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam שׁ֛וֹק <S%H7785><s%> Shok them hip עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H3409><s%> ya-Rech thigh מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> mak-Kah slaughter גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; with a great וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red and he went down וַיֵּ֔שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev, and dwelt בִּסְעִ֖יף <S%H5585><s%> bis-'If in the top סֶ֥לַע <S%H5553><s%> Se-la' of the rock עֵיטָֽם׃ <S%H5862><s%> 'ei-Tam. Etam ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu went up פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, Then the Philistines וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah; in Judah וַיִּנָּטְשׁ֖וּ <S%H5203><s%> vai-yin-na-te-Shu and spread בַּלֶּֽחִי׃ <S%H3896><s%> bal-Le-chi. themselves in Lehi

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah לָמָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah Why עֲלִיתֶ֣ם <S%H5927><s%> 'a-li-Tem Why are ye come up עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; against וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, against us;And they answered לֶאֱס֤וֹר <S%H631><s%> le-'e-Sor To bind אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> shim-shOn Samson עָלִ֔ינוּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Li-nu, are we come up לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do ל֔וֹ lo, כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher to him עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah to him as he hath done לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du went שְׁלֹשֶׁת֩ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shet Then three אֲלָפִ֨ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men מִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> mi-hu-Dah, of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to סְעִיף֮ <S%H5585><s%> se-'If to the top סֶ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> Se-la' of the rock עֵיטָם֒ <S%H5862><s%> 'ei-Tam Etam וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said לְשִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <S%H8123><s%> le-shim-Shon, to Samson הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta Knowest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <S%H4910><s%> mo-she-Lim [are] rulers בָּ֙נוּ֙ ba-nu פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, thou not that the Philistines וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- What זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot that עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta over us;what [is] this [that] thou hast done לָּ֑נוּ La-nu; וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto us;And he said לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher to them עָ֣שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'A-su unto them As they did לִ֔י Li, כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti unto me so have I done לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru And they said לוֹ֙ lo לֶאֱסָרְךָ֣ <S%H631><s%> le-'e-sa-re-Cha to bind יָרַ֔דְנוּ <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad-nu, unto him We are come down לְתִתְּךָ֖ <S%H5414><s%> le-tit-te-Cha thee that we may deliver בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- thee into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson הִשָּׁבְע֣וּ <S%H7650><s%> hish-sha-ve-'U unto them Swear לִ֔י Li, פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- you will not תִּפְגְּע֥וּן <S%H6293><s%> tif-ge-'Un unto me that ye will not fall upon בִּ֖י bi אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem. you

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru And they spake ל֣וֹ lo לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto him saying לֹ֚א <S%H3808><s%> lo No כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אָסֹ֤ר <S%H631><s%> 'a-Sor No but we will bind נֶֽאֱסָרְךָ֙ <S%H631><s%> ne-'e-sa-re-Cha thee fast וּנְתַנּ֣וּךָ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tan-Nu-cha and deliver בְיָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Dam, thee into their hand וְהָמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> ve-ha-Met but surely לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo No נְמִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4191><s%> ne-mi-Te-cha; we will not kill וַיַּאַסְרֻ֗הוּ <S%H631><s%> vai-ya-'as-Ru-hu, thee And they bound בִּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> bish-Na-yim him with two עֲבֹתִ֣ים <S%H5688><s%> 'a-vo-Tim cords חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> cha-da-Shim, new וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּהוּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu-hu and brought him up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַסָּֽלַע׃ <S%H5553><s%> has-Sa-la'. from the rock

הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he בָ֣א <S%H935><s%> va [And] when he came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against לֶ֔חִי <S%H3896><s%> Le-chi, unto Lehi וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim the Philistines הֵרִ֣יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> he-Ri-'u shouted לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-To; against וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <S%H6743><s%> vat-titz-Lach came mightily עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach him and the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַתִּהְיֶ֨ינָה <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-Yei-nah become הָעֲבֹתִ֜ים <S%H5688><s%> ha-'a-vo-Tim upon him and the cords אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- were on זְרוֹעוֹתָ֗יו <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'o-Tav, that [were] upon his arms כַּפִּשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6593><s%> kap-pish-Tim became as flax אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher is בָּעֲר֣וּ <S%H1197><s%> ba-'a-Ru that was burnt בָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> va-'Esh, with fire וַיִּמַּ֥סּוּ <S%H4549><s%> vai-yim-Mas-su loosed אֱסוּרָ֖יו <S%H612><s%> 'e-su-Rav and his bands מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from יָדָֽיו׃ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav. from off his hands

וַיִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-Tza And he found לְחִֽי־ <S%H3895><s%> le-chi- jawbone חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> cha-Mor of an ass טְרִיָּ֑ה <S%H2961><s%> te-ri-Yah; a new וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach and put forth יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand וַיִּקָּחֶ֔הָ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-ka-Che-ha, and took וַיַּךְ־ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yach- it and slew בָּ֖הּ bah אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> shim-Shon, And Samson בִּלְחִ֣י <S%H3895><s%> bil-Chi With the jawbone הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ha-cha-Mor, of an ass חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2563><s%> cha-Mor clay חֲמֹרָתָ֑יִם <S%H2563><s%> cha-mo-ra-Ta-yim; clay בִּלְחִ֣י <S%H3895><s%> bil-Chi with the jaw הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ha-cha-Mor, of an ass הִכֵּ֖יתִי <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kei-ti have I slain אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. men
